FuncDef: The display inof bfd session command displays information about BFD sessions in the iNOF system. The display inof bfd session command displays information about BFD sessions in the iNOF system. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to view information about BFD sessions in the iNOF system.
